entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
